subject: Sexual Health
title: Future of STI Prevention
description: A quick win: understand Future of STI Prevention.

hook.text: Scientists are working on vaccines for HIV, herpes, and chlamydia that could transform prevention.

buildup.text: mRNA technology, proven with COVID vaccines, is now being tested for STI vaccine development.

discovery.text: Rapid point-of-care tests could allow people to screen for multiple STIs in minutes, not days.

twist.text: Technology alone won't end STIs. Education, access, and equity must advance alongside the science.

climax.text: The next decade could see breakthroughs that make several common STIs fully preventable.

punchline.text: The future of prevention is closer than ever.

quiz.question: What technology is being tested for new STI vaccines?
